ygData.subject: RE: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s certainly worth testing. Funny anecdote.  A friend of mine was running from a train and managed to zone.  You know how mobs can still hit you for a
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 10 Nov 1999, Beth Frantz wrote:
>
> while. Finally, at about 2 bbls of health left, I realized I had
> Melanie's Mellifluous Motion memorized, and tried it out just to see if it
> would work. It did!!! I was able to back up the 2 feet to the zone and
> start breathing again. Does this song break other types of roots?

It's certainly worth testing.

Funny anecdote. A friend of mine was running from a train and
managed to zone. You know how mobs can still hit you for a
while after you've zoned and you come out with fewer hp than
when you hit the zone? Well, apparently one of the mobs
rooted my friend during this interval. He came out safe on
the other side, but rooted.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
